snippet: Nascar suspended Kenseth for two races for intentionally wrecking Joey Logano in an act of retaliation that changed the lineup of drivers in the running for the championship.
abstract: Matt Kenseth is suspended two races after he intentionally wrecks Joey Logano during race at Martinsville Speedway, changing lineup of drivers still vying for Nascar championship.
lead_paragraph: Nascar suspended Kenseth for two races for intentionally wrecking Joey Logano in an act of retaliation that changed the lineup of drivers in the running for the championship.

headline.main: Wreck Gets Matt Kenseth a Two-Race Ban
headline.print_headline: Wreck Gets Kenseth a Two-Race Ban

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
